title: Caffe2 Train your own image
body_html:
Hi,
I would like to train my own set of images(Railroad signals). I would like to know how to do that from scratch. The tutorial is inadequate and does not explain how to do image training from scratch but explains in using a pre-trained dataset/models(e.g iris or handwriting).

Appreciate if the tutorial can be relooked in explaining how to train images from scratch.

Thanks
